Tentative Schedule (Thursday 8/25 - First Day of Fall term).

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| error: false
#| results: asis

library(readxl)
library(kableExtra)

schedule <- readxl::read_excel('Schedule.xlsx', sheet = 1)[,-2]
knitr::kable(schedule) %>%
	kable_styling(full_width = F)
```
